summary: A German high school kid has his dick talking to him. Its advice keeps getting Flo into trouble. His friend has plans on how Flo can get his dream girl.
cast: Tobias Schenke|Axel Stein|Diana Amft|Rebecca von Mitzlaff|Carmen-Maja Antoni|Petra Zieser|Tom Lass|Nicky Kantor|Alexa Sommer|Michael Herbig|Axel Milberg|Christine Neubauer|Miriam von Versen|Edeltraud Schubert|Monika Manz|Ana Nova|Nina Eichinger|Simone Sander|Sabra Stellmann|Sylvia Zimnik|Joseph Hannesschläger|Antoine Monot Jr.|Sebastian Faust|Uta Schmidt-Caneva|Herman van Ulzen|Vivian Kanner
title: Knallharte Jungs
